document_data.name: ''Ring of Fire Elemental Command''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of fire elemental command''''' was a powerful [[magic item]] that granted the wearer many benefits related to its [[element]].
document_data.Powers:
A ''ring of fire elemental command'' would appear to be a ''[[ring of fire resistance]]'' until a specific condition was met which unlocked the ring's true potential.

These rings provided a boon of fire-related advantages to the wearer. [[Fire elemental]]s could not approach within {{SI|5|ft}} of the wearer unless desired by the wearer. The wearer could attempt to charm any fire elemental they came in contact with, but if the charm failed the creature could easily approach the wearer.

Any creature from an [[Elemental planes|elemental plane]] outside of the ring found it slightly more difficult to physically strike and harm the wearer. Additionally, it was much easier for the wearer to strike and harm creatures from other elemental planes even with non-magical weapons.

The wearer could converse with any creature native to the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].

Once unlocked, a ''ring of fire elemental command'' provided the following powers to the wearer: ''[[burning hands]]'' once per ten minutes, ''[[pyrotechnics]]'' twice per day, ''[[wall of fire]]'' once per day, ''[[flame strike]]'' once per week, and a constant resistance to fire.

One drawback to the wielder of one of these rings was a significant vulnerability to water- or cold-based attacks.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Daltim Flamefist]], the famed [[Halruaan]] [[wizard]], wore a ''ring of fire elemental command''.{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993 rare set|7}}
